pages.text: Getting from A to B is tedious.$(br)Especially in the case of $(l:resources/geodes)Geodes$(/l), they are usually far away, so the journey there takes quite some time.$(br)With these magic boots you are much more mobile than before.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Increases both Movement Speed and Step Height.

pages.title: Power
pages.text: The Power enchantment increases the movement speed bonus further.
